original: unfold filterlim. intros P [eps Heps]. unfold filtermap. unfold Rbar_locally. destruct x; unfold within; simpl in *. - specialize (Heps m). destruct Heps as [M HM]. exists M. intros. apply HM. auto. - exists (2 + Rmax 0 m). intros. apply Heps; auto with real. - exists (2 - Rmax 0 m). intros. apply Heps; auto with real.
